functions.name: DebugFeatureLoweringPhase::Run
functions.logic: This function runs the DebugFeatureLowering phase. It is conditionally compiled based on the `V8_ENABLE_DEBUG_CODE` macro. If the macro is defined, it executes the `CopyingPhase` with `DebugFeatureLoweringReducer` to lower debug features in the Turboshaft graph. If the macro is not defined, the function effectively does nothing.
